infos.name: --unity-metrics-single_line-height

The usual height for a single-line Editor control, for example, a one-line text field.
 See EditorGUIUtility.singleLineHeight

infos.description: The usual height for a small single-line Editor control, for example, a mini toggle or a mini text field
